item.title: Post-quantum security for SSH access on GitHub
item.description: ðŸš€ GitHub is enhancing SSH access security with a new post-quantum secure key exchange algorithm called sntrup761x25519-sha512. This upgrade will protect Git data against future quantum computing threats. ðŸ”’ The changes will take effect on September 17, 2025, and will only affect SSH connections, leaving HTTPS access unchanged. ðŸ”§ Users with compatible SSH clients will benefit without needing adjustments. #GitHub #Cybersecurity #PostQuantum #SSH #DataProtection
